description: Ogata Isshinsai would have been the first disciple of Ryouzanpaku, however the elder saw that he had evil intentions. He is the true power behind Ragnarok. He is a Dou Martial Artist. He shows Ken`ichi the path of Asura, which the Elder wanted Ken`ichi to witness. He develops an interest in Ken`ichi and invites him to become his disciple, but Ken`ichi turns him down. He tries to stop the fight between Ken`ichi and Odin in order to have both as his disciples but the Ryouzanpaku crew dissuades him. After Ragnarok crumbles, he is revealed to be among the leadership of Yami. His symbol is flow. He acts as the caretaker of YOMI.
name: Ogata Isshinsai
